songs.title: Can You Handle It
songs.lyrics:
MR. LARGE: Yeah, well, anyway, I got your résumé faxed to me this morning

TARIQ: Résumé?

TRU: Shhh!

MR. LARGE: I see you come with outstanding merits. Let’s see… You work well with people. You have experience in handling money. Shift Manager at Boston Chicken. Hmmm… Rather impressive. What makes you think you could handle hustling?
